summary: REQ-1 is implemented by adding the Contentsquare script tag to frontend/index.html inside <head> while keeping existing Google Analytics tags intact. REQ-2 appears implemented via a new verification utility that logs English success/warning messages without throwing, but the diff summary does not include the actual code change showing that this verification runs on app startup (only a secondary summary claims it).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a lightweight install verification check that reports success/failure in the browser console (and does not break the app if blocked).
missing_requirements.reason: A verification utility was added, but the diff summary does not include concrete code evidence that it is invoked at runtime (e.g., from frontend/src/main.tsx). Without invocation, the console messages may never appear.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions main.tsx runs verification, but main.tsx diff content is not shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Modifications to Internet Identity hook (authentication-related code) unrelated to adding Contentsquare tracking or verification.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add a Contentsquare script in <head> and add an install verification check; it does not request any Internet Identity/authentication changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update in project_state.json unrelated to the requested Contentsquare integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project state/metadata files.
